cast.name: 马克西米利安·西蒙斯切克 Maximilian Simonischek
克里斯蒂安·贝克尔 Christian Berkel
弗里德里克·贝希特 Friederike Becht

introduction: Simonischek plays Jonas, a police officer who for years has worked as the personal bodyguard for local politician Mittendorf, played by Berkel. Jonas's girlfriend (Becht) is the press spokesperson for Mittendorf. After a business gala, she disappears for a while. When she shows up again, she tells Jonas that Mittendorf has sexually harassed her. Jonas urges her to report Mittendorf, but she hesitates, since there is no evidence and Mittendorf apologised to her. But finally, the situation escalates and Jonas is forced to take action.
